name: Auroran
description: The servants of Miridia, Auroran are Daedra of light. Wielding blinding magic, and adorned in shimmering golden armour, they vaguely resemble both Knights and Golden Saints. Defenders of Miridiaâ€™s Shrines, and inhabitants of the Coloured Rooms, they are rarely encountered by chance.

abilities.name: Light of Meridia
abilities.description: Flip a Destiny point to activate Light of Meridia. All targets in visual range with the Auroran must pass a :hard: Resilience check or be blinded for two rounds, as bright light emanates from it.

abilities.name: Spells: Sunbeam
abilities.description: Choose a target at short or medium range for this attack and make an :average: Destruction check. If successful, this magic attack inflicts 5 damage +1 damage per :success:, with the Burn quality, and a Critical Rating of 3.
